description: "A map by the influential London cartographer, Herman Moll (1654?—1732), showing Southeast Asia in the context of the wider Asian region. Interestingly, the Strait of Malacca is labelled as the ‘Str. of Sincapora’ (Straits of Singapore)."
label: "A chart of ye East-Indies with the coast of Persia, China also the Philipina, Moluca and Sunda Islands, &c / by Herman Moll, geographer."
